_description: This file contains all available configuration options with their default values and descriptions
_enhancement_level_description: AI enhancement level: disabled, minimal, standard, full, aggressive

ai_service._api_key_env_var_description: Environment variable name containing API key
ai_service._retry_attempts_description: Number of retry attempts on failure

cache._ttl_seconds_description: Cache time-to-live in seconds (null = no expiration)
cache._invalidate_on_rule_update_description: Clear cache when rules are updated

confidence._threshold_description: Minimum confidence score to report violation (0-100)
confidence._review_threshold_description: Threshold below which results need review
confidence._agreement_boost_description: Confidence boost when AI and rules agree
confidence._disagreement_penalty_description: Confidence penalty when AI and rules disagree

features._enable_promotional_ai_description: Enable AI for promotional content checks
features._enable_performance_ai_description: Enable AI for performance data checks
features._enable_general_ai_description: Enable AI for general compliance checks
features._enable_feedback_loop_description: Enable feedback loop for continuous learning

hitl._review_threshold_description: Confidence threshold below which violations are queued for human review (0-100)
hitl._auto_queue_low_confidence_description: Automatically queue low-confidence violations for review
hitl._queue_max_size_description: Maximum number of items in review queue (oldest items evicted when full)
hitl._batch_similarity_threshold_description: Similarity threshold for grouping violations in batch operations (0.0-1.0)
hitl._interactive_mode_default_description: Start in interactive review mode by default
hitl._audit_log_path_description: Directory path for storing audit logs
hitl._export_formats_description: Supported export formats for audit logs and reports

review_priorities._critical_severity_boost_description: Priority boost for critical severity violations
review_priorities._low_confidence_boost_description: Priority boost for low confidence violations
review_priorities._age_penalty_per_hour_description: Priority penalty per hour that item has been in queue

_backward_compatible_description: Maintain backward compatibility with legacy systems
_batch_size_description: Number of items to process in each batch
_fallback_to_rules_description: Fall back to rule-based checking if AI fails
